ques: She tended to _________ during long lectures.
She had to _________ the meeting due to bad weather conditions.
She knew she could always _________ her savings in emergencies.
She hoped that her hard work would eventually _________ in success.
She asked him to _________ the store on his way home.
She had to _________ her roommate because of constant arguments.
She wanted to _________ their plans before making a decision.
She watched the sun _________ below the horizon.
She was surprised when he didn't _________ for the meeting.
She decided to _________ the road to prevent traffic from entering.
She liked to _________ at restaurants on weekends.
She was deeply saddened when her grandmother _________.
She needed to _________ all the expenses to see if they matched the budget.
She wanted to _________ the wrinkles in her dress before the party.
She had to _________ the possibility of delays when planning the trip.
He saw the price of the stock _________ sharply.

He decided to _________ the event because of low attendance.
He had to _________ the area for safety reasons.
He needed to _________ extra time for unexpected events.
He couldn't _________ the numbers correctly, so he asked for help.
He often _________ with his colleagues during lunch breaks.
He had a backup plan to _________ if his first idea failed.
He wanted to _________ the troublemakers from the party.
He needed to _________ the details of the contract with the client.
He promised to _________ on time for the event.
He decided to _________ the coffee shop for a quick drink.
He would often _________ and forget what he was doing.
He couldn't believe it when his pet dog suddenly _________.
He suggested they _________ their concerns with the team.
They knew that saving money would _________ when they retired.
They decided to _________ the issues in their relationship.
They planned to _________ the library to return their books.
They planned to _________ the section of the park for construction.
They tried not to _________ during important discussions.
They would _________ to celebrate special occasions.
They felt the temperature _________ as evening approached.

They were relieved when their friend finally _________ at the party.
They threatened to _________ the disruptive student from class.
They decided to _________ their scores to determine the winner.
They needed to _________ the details of the upcoming project.
They reluctantly _________ the picnic because of a sudden storm.
They didn't have to worry because they could _________ their parents for support.
They always _________ some flexibility in their schedules.
It's convenient to _________ when you don't feel like cooking.
It's important to _________ when you've made a commitment.
It's convenient to _________ a place when you're in the neighborhood.
It's rewarding when your efforts _________ with positive results.
It's necessary to _________ the entrance during the event.

It's not easy to _________ someone from a group or organization.

It's important to _________ any misunderstandings in communication.
It's disappointing to _________ plans at the last minute.
It's important to _________ all the ingredients for the recipe.
It's easy to _________ when you're tired or distracted.
It's wise to _________ a margin of error in your calculations.
It's relaxing to watch the sun _________ in the evening.
It's reassuring to have something to _________ when things go wrong.
He wondered why she didn't _________ to the appointment.
He hoped they could _________ the issues and find a solution.
He forgot to _________ the cost of shipping in his budget.
He hoped he wouldn't have to _________ anyone from the team.
He often _________ the gym after work to exercise.
He hoped he wouldn't have to _________ the trip.
He preferred to _________ rather than cook at home.
He was patient, waiting for his dedication to _________.
He apologized for _________ during the presentation.
He wanted to remember the good times even after his father _________.
He used cones to _________ the parking spaces.
He was puzzled by the math problem and couldn't _________ the figures.
He hoped they could _________ the problems in the project.
He wondered why the value of the currency was _________.
He was glad he had something to _________ when he lost his job.
